tier_description.platinum: Platinum sponsors provide the highest level of support and receive maximum visibility and exclusive benefits.
tier_description.gold: Gold sponsors provide strong support and receive featured placement and special recognition.
tier_description.silver: Silver sponsors provide valuable support and are recognized on our website and materials.
tier_description.bronze: Bronze sponsors provide basic support and are recognized as valued supporters of our projects.
